name: Ovni (Space.cpp)
description:
This is a short game made during a game development course on Senac school.

The objective of the game is to collect all colored stones scattered through the level and enter the exit portal. Once all stones are collected the level activates a timer and must be exited before it self-destructs.

You move using the arrow keys. Avoid touching the enemies. If you die, simply press "R" to restart the level.
